text.section: This title does not limit the right of an individual to practice a health occupation that the individual is authorized to practice under this article.

section.section: In this subsection, "registrant or permit holder" means a person regulated under Title 5 of the Business Regulation Article as a registered cemeterian, registered seller, or holder of a permit to operate a cemetery or burial goods business.

This title does not apply to:
The business of operating a cemetery, including the sale of cemetery lots, grave sites, mausoleums, monuments, lawn crypts, or vaults;
The ownership of a crematory or the business of operating a crematory in which:
A registrant or permit holder owns a greater percentage of the crematory than a person licensed under this title;
Ownership is equal between a registrant or permit holder and a person licensed under this title; or
Neither a registrant, permit holder, or person licensed under this title has an ownership interest in the crematory; or
The ownership of a crematory or the business of operating a crematory or incinerator at a licensed medical facility or educational institution.
